DOC.brief_summary: This study was a multicenter, randomized, PROBE-type (prospective, randomized, open label, blinded end-point) study of 12 weeks duration comprising four visits, carried out in patients with essential arterial hypertension not controlled on four weeks treatment with amlodipine 5 mg alone.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of a Combination of Amlodipine/Valsartan on 24H Blood Pressure Control With One Nocturnal or Diurnal Intake a Day
